Post-Match Reflections: The Astros were one win away from getting back to the World Series.
Justin Verlander said, "That’s one of the reasons I wanted to come back here... I think moving forward, there’s still a good window available."
Alex Bregman said, "We got outplayed, and we'll learn from the mistakes this offseason. We'll get after it and be ready to get back to competing."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros had a strange year overall, getting off to a slow start, being bad at home, dominating on the road, and their pitching being a shell of itself.
Others: The Astros have a history of rebounding from losses in the past, winning the championship the next year after losing in the ALCS in 2018, and winning it in 2021 after losing in the ALCS in 2020.
